sentence.Network_en: I rid myself of many superfluous belongings and habits that bothered me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把很多无用的物品都丢掉了，并且改掉了一些让我烦心的习惯。

sentence.Network_en: She gave him a look that made words superfluous.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看了他一眼，这已表明一切，无须多言了。

sentence.Network_en: He had already been told, so our comments were superfluous.
sentence.Network_cn: 早就有人同他说过, 所以我们的意见是多余的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... refluent a 倒流的 superfluous a 过剩的，多余的 superfluity n 过剩，太多.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... refluent a 倒流的 superfluous a 过剩的，多余的 superfluity n 过剩，太多.
冗字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 freeandatleisure〗 多余〖 superfluous〗 离散,向四周散开〖 scattered〗.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... superficial 表面的,肤浅的 superfluous 不必要,过多的 superimpose 置于他物之上,附加.

list.abs: superficial 表面superfluous parameters 多余参数supergraph 超图
superficial folding 表层褶皱superfluous water 过剩水分superglacial moraine 表碛

the formation of double superfluous economy has its supply and demand the reason of two respects , superfluous economy makes growth of our country economy lack of power , the enterprise faces dilemma .双过剩经济的形成有其供给和需求两方面的原因，过剩经济使得我国经济增长乏力，企业面临困境。
俄罗斯文学的“多余的人”（superfluous man）的概念，对那些感觉困惑且跟不上变革步伐的日本人特别有吸引力。something superfluo…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin superfluus, from super- 'over' + fluere 'to flow'

entry.tran: 多余的;过剩的;不必要的
entry.def: Something that is superfluous is unnecessary or is no longer needed.

example.ex: My presence at the afternoon's proceedings was superfluous...
example.tran: 我去参加下午的活动是多此一举。

example.ex: I rid myself of many superfluous belongings and habits that bothered me.
example.tran: 我把很多无用的物品都丢掉了，并且改掉了一些让我烦心的习惯。

means.word_mean: 1. serving no useful purpose; having no excuse for being;
2. more than is needed, desired, or required;

sentences.sentence: "found some extra change lying on the dresser"
"yet another book on heraldry might be thought redundant"
"it was supererogatory of her to gloat"
"extra ribs as well as other supernumerary internal parts"

auth_sentence.content: He may have felt any extra knowledge was superfluous.
auth_sentence.res_content: He may have felt any extra knowledge was superfluous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He may have felt any extra knowledge was superfluous.

auth_sentence.content: It is no big loss when superfluous things disappear.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is no big loss when superfluous things disappear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is no big loss when superfluous things disappear.

auth_sentence.content: They work but in a mildly superfluous manner.
auth_sentence.res_content: They work but in a mildly superfluous manner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They work but in a mildly superfluous manner.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……上面"; 2. 表示"超级,超过,过度"

stems_affixes.word_buile: super在……上面+fic做+ial……的→在表面上做
super超级,超过,过度+annuated有年纪的→adj.老迈的,老式的
super超级,超过,过度+cili眉毛+ous……的→在眉毛上看人→目中无人
super超级,超过,过度+flu流+ous……的→超过了流出来
super超级,超过,过度+natural自然的→adj.超自然的
super超级,超过,过度+sensitive敏感的→adj.过度敏感的
super超级,超过,过度+sized大小的→adj.超大型的
super超级,超过,过度+sonic音速的→adj.超音速的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 极度的, 极大的, 至高的, 最高的
stems_affixes.word_buile: supre=super超级,超过,过度+eme→adj.极度的, 极大的, 至高的, 最高的
super在……上面+stit建立+ion表名词→建立在人[理智]之上的东西→迷信
super超级,超过,过度+market市场→n.超级市场
super在……上面+impose放上去→在上面放→强加
super在……上面+intend想要,打算→在上面算计→监督
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]
super在……上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视
super超级,超过,过度+charge收费,负担→负担过重

means.word_mean: 过多的; 过剩的; 多余的

sentences.en: He had already been told, so our comments were superfluous.
sentences.cn: 早就有人同他说过, 所以我们的意见是多余的。

jushi.english: He didn't know how to blow off his superfluous energy.
jushi.chinese: 他不知如何发泄过剩的精力。
